mapper.update: update ts_user set password=#{password},psw=#{psw} WHERE id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select t4.content title_en, t2.*,t3.image_url FROM tm_tour t1 left join tb_order t2 on t1.id = t2.tour_id LEFT JOIN tm_tour_image t3 on t1.id=t3.tour_id AND t3.thumbnail=1 LEFT JOIN ts_language t4 ON t1.title= t4.uuid and t4.type=#{language } where t2.user_id=#{userId} AND t2.state != 'CC' ORDER BY t2.placedtime DESC limit #{number},6
select count(*) FROM tm_tour t1 left join tb_order t2 on t1.id = t2.tour_id LEFT JOIN tm_tour_image t3 on t1.id=t3.tour_id AND t3.thumbnail=1 where t2.user_id=#{userId}
select target FROM th_rating WHERE targetid=#{targetId} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update tb_order set state='CC' WHERE orderno=#{orderNo}
